title: Attempting to reconnect and game crashes
body:
Every game or every other game I will suddenly just attempt to reconnect for no reason. I don't lose internet or anything it just dc's. And in the past couple of days I've been crashing like crazy in my games, last game i crashed 3 times and only once a bugsplat came up. Help pls ;_;

Edit: I also will disconnect in the client too, happened right after i posted, repaired the client today and updated my computer.. don't know what else to do :(

replies.body: The servers may have been going down for maintenance during this time for the patch update.  is this still an issue?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0u3qee2F,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-04-05T20:27:57.327+0000)
>
> The servers may have been going down for maintenance during this time for the patch update.  is this still an issue?

Yeah, happened again twice today, just dc's tho not bugsplats, and like i know its the game because my internet is still on when it dcs

It looks like the servers were down for maintenance again per the [PBE status ](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)page.  There could be some hiccups until everything's back up.    As a heads up, though, you can still have great internet but face issues reaching specific services like the game servers.  Hope that helps!
